txt.en:
[placeholder],

I would ask that you seek me out in the Scholar's Stair in Bree. I have a matter that I think you are prepared to deal with, and there is something to be learned from doing this.

Biarn
'It is good to see you. I will not bore you with conversation... better to save the words for the task at hand.'
You received a letter from your trainer in Bree-town asking for you to return to him. Apparently, there is something that he wishes to teach you.
Bring the letter to Biarn in Bree
Biarn sent you a letter requesting that you visit him at the Scholar's Stair in Bree.\n\nDeliver the letter to Biarn within the Scholar's Stair in Bree.
